name: Decentralized Community Investment Protocol
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: DCIP is the first, fully community led investment platform. The token holders fully decide the investments and the sell offs. Rewards will be distributed in BNB or BUSD. Losses are fully tied to the fund itself and won't be reflected on the tokenholders
